hanzi-su-wiki:
講

Значения

Читать (лекцию); придумывать; принимать (меры)

Мнемоника

Рассматривать проблему со всех сторон, строить речь 言 как леса 冓.

Варианты

讲
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiǎng
to speak; to explain; to negotiate; to emphasise; to be particular about; as far as sth is concerned; speech; lecture
говорить; объяснить; вести переговоры; подчеркнуть; быть внимательным; что касается sth; речь; лекция

講座 [ jiǎng zuò ]: a course of lectures; Classifiers: 个
講述 [ jiǎng shù ]: to talk about; to narrate; to give an account

heisig_chinese_memo: I have a word funnel attached to my laptop that takes my professor's lecture and puts the words into a text file. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: lecture, say, words, keitai, mouth, funnel, cone, celery, again
koohiiStory1: I have a funnel attached to my laptop that takes my prof´s lecture and puts the words into a text file. The bigger the funnel, the more accurate the conversion, so picture a bunch of laptops with large, unwieldy funnels attached to the USB port.
koohiiStory2: Image: a professor walking around with a funnel and simply pouring his words into each students head instead of a lecture. (Primitive: FUNNEL, who got the celery stuck in the funnel again?! You know it´s not supposed to be used for that!).
jp_example_words:
講習(こうしゅう): short course, training
講読(こうどく): reading, translation
聴講(ちょうこう): lecture attendance, auditing
休講(きゅうこう): lecture cancelled
講演(こうえん): lecture, address
講師(こうし): lecturer
講義(こうぎ): lecture
講堂(こうどう): lecture hall
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Try to say something to a lifeguard and you'll just end up getting a lecture.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: A lifeguard's favorite part of the job is telling people what to do, where to swim, when to get out of the water, and they love saying it in a bunch of words.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This lecture loving lifeguard is none other than こういち! I mean, look how long winded the stuff on this site is? Can you imagine him trying to give you a talk about proper swimming etiquette?
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Close your eyes and picture こういち lecturing you. Ugh, it's the worst!
Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be こう.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 構 (かまえる、コウ строение, поза, забота, беспокойство о чём-то), 購 (コウ покупка, подписка), 溝 (みぞ、どぶ、コウ канава).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese: jiǎng: (глаг) говорить, рассказывать; объяснять; обсуждать, договариваться; обращать внимание, придавать особое значение
Kanshudo_mnemonic: drag words (言) from a well again (冓) = a lecture
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Boring lectures can seem like and endless well of words.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to "冓" sound, the original meaning is reconciliation. "Shuowen": "Reconciliation. From words, 冓声." "Warring States Policy‧Qi Ce II": "Qin attacked Zhao, Zhao Linglou slowly sought to talk about Qin with five cities, and conquered it." Gao Induction note: "Speak, and make peace."

" Speaking " can mean speaking or talking. "Zhuangzi·De Chongfu": "Confucius said: "Qiu is ugly, Master Hu is not in love? Please tell what you have heard.""

" Speaking " can also mean exercises and training. "Mandarin ‧ Lu Yu": "Finally, I will speak at the meeting, in order to rectify the meaning of the class." Wei Zhao's note: "Talk, learn."

" Speaking " can also mean emphasizing and paying attention. "The Analects of Confucius-Shuer": "If you don't cultivate morality, you don't learn it, you can't change the sense of justice, and you can't change it if you are bad. It's my worry."

" Speaking " can also mean understanding and knowing. "Book of Rites‧Rites": "Associate with art, talk about benevolence, and get strong." Kong Yingdashu: "Speak, it is still clear."

" Talking " can also refer to school examinations and comparisons. "Mandarin ‧ Zheng Yu": "Choose ministers and remonstrances, and talk about multiple things, and work together." Wei Zhao's note: "Speaking is still a school."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " yan " and "冓", the original meaning is reconciliation.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「冓」聲，本義為和解。《說文》：「和解也。从言，冓聲。」 《戰國策‧齊策二》：「秦攻趙，趙令樓緩以五城求講於秦，而與之伐齊。」高誘注：「講，和。」

　　「講」可表示講說、談論。《莊子‧德充符》：「孔子曰：『丘則陋矣，夫子胡不入乎？請講以所聞。』」

　　「講」也可表示演習、訓練。《國語‧魯語上》：「終則講於會，以正班爵之義。」韋昭注：「講，習也。」

　　「講」還可表示講求、注重。《論語‧述而》：「德之不修，學之不講，聞義不能徙，不善不能改，是吾憂也。」

　　「講」亦可表示明白、知曉。《禮記‧禮運》：「協於藝，講於仁，得之者強。」孔穎達疏：「講，猶明也。」

　　「講」還能指考校、比較。《國語‧鄭語》：「擇臣取諫工而講以多物，務和同也。」韋昭注：「講，猶校也。」

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 冓 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 冓 [ gòu ] secret, niche, hiding-hole, cabinet
①說，談：講話。講敘。
②把事情和道理說出來：講說。講學。講武。講演。講義。講師。講壇。
③注重某一方面，並設法使它實現：講求。講團結。
④和解：“而秦未與魏講也”。
⑤商量，商議：講價兒。講條件。
⑥道說談敘。

從「 言 」，「 冓 」聲，本義為和解。《說文》：「和解也。从言，冓聲。」 《戰國策‧齊策二》：「秦攻趙，趙令樓緩以五城求講於秦，而與之伐齊。」高誘注：「講，和。」 「 講 」可表示講說、談論。《莊子‧德充符》：「孔子曰：『丘則陋矣，夫子胡不入乎？請講以所聞。』」 「 講 」也可表示演習、訓練。《國語‧魯語上》：「終則講於會，以正班爵之義。」韋昭注：「講，習也。」 「 講 」還可表示講求、注重。《論語‧述而》：「德之不修，學之不講，聞義不能徙，不善不能改，是吾憂也。」 「 講 」亦可表示明白、知曉。《禮記‧禮運》：「協於藝，講於仁，得之者強。」孔穎達疏：「講，猶明也。」 「 講 」還能指考校、比較。《國語‧鄭語》：「擇臣取諫工而講以多物，務和同也。」韋昭注：「講，猶校也。」
From " yan" to " 冓" sound, the original meaning is reconciliation. "Shuowen": "Reconciliation. From words, 冓声." "Warring States Policy‧Qi Ce II": "Qin attacked Zhao, Zhao Linglou slowly sought to talk about Qin with five cities, and conquered it." Gao Induction note: "Speak, and make peace." " Speaking" can mean speaking or talking. "Zhuangzi·De Chongfu": "Confucius said: "Qiu is ugly, Master Hu is not in love? Please tell what you have heard."" " Speaking" can also mean exercises and training. "Mandarin ‧ Lu Yu": "Finally, I will speak at the meeting, in order to rectify the meaning of the class." Wei Zhao's note: "Talk, learn." " Speaking" can also mean emphasizing and paying attention. "The Analects of Confucius-Shuer": "If you don't cultivate morality, you don't learn it, you can't change the sense of justice, and you can't change it if you are bad. It's my worry." " Speaking" can also mean understanding and knowing. "Book of Rites‧Rites": "Associate with art, talk about benevolence, and get strong." Kong Yingdashu: "Speak, it is still clear." " Talking" can also refer to school examinations and comparisons. "Mandarin ‧ Zheng Yu": "Choose ministers and remonstrances, and talk about multiple things, and work together." Wei Zhao's note: "Speaking is still a school."

講字的基本解释

講
jiǎng
见“讲”。

講字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎng］
［《廣韻》古項切，上講，見。］
“讲1”的繁体字。
(1)和解。
(2)讲说；谈论。
(3)商议；商量。
(4)演习；训练。
(5)谋画。
(6)讲求；注重。
(7)明白；知晓。
(8)考校；比较。
(9)通“構”。交合；连结。
(10)通“顜”。明确；始终一贯。

講字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　講； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第24
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古項切，音港。【說文】和解也。【徐曰】古人言講解猶和解也。【戰國策】今君禁之，而秦未與魏講也。　又【廣雅】論也。【廣韻】告也。【禮·禮運】講信修睦。【疏】談說也。【又】講於仁。【疏】猶明也。　又【玉篇】習也。【增韻】究也。【易·兌卦】君子以朋友講習。【左傳·隱五年】故春蒐，夏苗，秋獮，冬狩，皆於農?以講事也。【周禮·夏官·校人】冬獻馬講馭夫。【註】講猶?習。　又【廣韻】謀也。【左傳·襄五年】詩曰：講事不令，集人來定。【杜註】逸詩也。言謀事不善，當聚致賢人以定之。　又官名。【唐書·百官志】國子監有直講四人，以經術講授。又【舊唐書·職官志】集賢殿書院有侍講學士。　又山名。【山海經】泰室之山北三十里曰講山。　又與顜通。【前漢·曹參傳】蕭何爲法，講若畫一。【史記】作顜。　又【字彙補】居?切，音媾。和也。【史記·甘茂傳】樗里子與魏講罷兵。【註】講，讀曰媾。　【說文】本作?。

[①]［jiǎng］
["Guangyun" Ancient Xiangqie, let's talk about it, see you. ]
Traditional characters of "说1".
(1) Reconciliation.
(2) Talk; talk.
(3) Negotiate; negotiate.
(4) Exercises; training.
(5) Planning for painting.
(6) Emphasize; pay attention to.
(7) Understand; Know.
(8) Examination; comparison.
(9) Link "construction". Mate; link.
(10) Through "顜". Be clear; always consistent.

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 talk; Kangxi strokes: 17; page number: page 1175 24
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Ancient item cut, Yingang. [Said the text] Reconciliation also. [Xu Yue] The ancients said that it is still reconciled. [Warring States Policy] Today, the emperor banned it, but Qin Wei and Wei also talked about it.　[Guang Ya] Discuss also. [Guang Yun] Tell me too. 【Rite·Rite Fortune】Talking about faith and cultivating harmony. [Sparse] Talk about it. [Also] Talk about Yuren. [Sparse] It's still clear.　 [Jade articles] Xi Ye. [Zeng Yun] Research also. [Easy·Duigua] A gentleman teaches as a friend. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Five Years] So Chun Sou, Xia Miao, Qiu Li, and Winter Hunting are all in agriculture? 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Schoolman】Winter presents horses and talks about controlling husbands. [Note] Talk about it? Practice.　[Guang Yun] Again. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Five Years] The poem said: Telling things without ordering, gather people to decide. [Du Note] Yi Shi also. If the words and plans are not good, we should gather the wise men to decide.　Also official name. 【Book of Tang·Hundred Officials】The Imperial College had four direct lecturers who taught them by means of classics. Also【Old Tang Book·Official Records】Jixiandian Academy has a bachelor of attendant lectures.　Also the name of the mountain. [Shan Hai Jing] Thirty miles north of the mountain in the Thai room, it is said to talk about the mountain.　 and 顜通 again. [Previous Han · Cao Shen Biography] What Xiao is the law, it is like painting one. [Historical Records] Composing.　[Word Supplement] Ju? Cut, sound 媾. And also. 【Historical Records·The Legend of Gan Mao】Ai Lizi and Wei talk about giving up their soldiers. [Note] Speaking, reading Yueyue.　【Said the text】This work?.

jiǎng
вм. 讲
Radicals: 言, 冓  (say, lifeguard)
Meaning Mnemonic
Try to say something to a lifeguard and you'll just end up getting a lecture.
A lifeguard's favorite part of the job is telling people what to do, where to swim, when to get out of the water, and they love saying it in a bunch of words.
Reading Mnemonic
This lecture loving lifeguard is none other than こういち! I mean, look how long winded the stuff on this site is? Can you imagine him trying to give you a talk about proper swimming etiquette?
Close your eyes and picture こういち lecturing you. Ugh, it's the worst!
Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be こう.
